import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Col, Row, ListGroup, Badge, Modal, Button, Form, } from "react-bootstrap"; import numberWithCommas from "../utils/utils"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faMinus, faPlus, faTrash } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; const ModalKeranjang = ({ handleClose, showModal, keranjangDetail, keterangan, tambah, kurang, jumlah,changeHandler, handleSubmit}) => { if (keranjangDetail) { return ( {keranjangDetail.product.nama} {""} ({numberWithCommas(keranjangDetail.product.harga)})

Total Harga

{keranjangDetail.total_harga} Jumlah Pesan
{jumlah} Keterangan : {changeHandler(event)}}/>
); } else { return ( Kosong Woohoo, you're reading this text in a modal! ); } }; export default ModalKeranjang;
